text: Hey. We use form submission when applicants apply for a job. Is there a way to put the job title within the subject line in email notifications at all?

If you have access to the Workflows tool (Marketing Hub Pro or Enterprise) you can use the form submission to trigger an email which uses the job title as a personalization token: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/how-do-i-personalize-the-subject-line-of-my-email>
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-automated-emails-to-use-in-workflows>
